divs: sighting detailswoke up and decided to look out my 8th floor north facing window. just as i was looking at the clear night sky over the nearby roof tops i saw this blue-green glowing sphere shape object heading from east to west aprox 45 degree desending at a high rate of speed heading below my view behind the nearby apartment buildings, it appeared the size of a helicopter if 1\4 mile away. my cell phone displayed 3:26 am. in the early evening summer around 1986 or 1987 i was driving to falmouth mass. and saw a similar blue-green object passing thru the clouds at a high rate of speed, at the time i was told the military reported it being a hot air ballon. my first impression of this object was how lucky to see this blue-green sphere again but then thought i would have preferred it to have been like some of the other never reported incidents i observed throughout my life which were i felt more interesting.
